description: One of the best miner app for Ubuntu. Best suitable with dedicated GPU users. I'm using Cudo Miner since October 2019.

Will run in the background, mining with either CPU, GPU or both.
I've been running this software for nearly 12 months now on an old XEON quad desktop &had only one issue.
I'm not sure how to enable coolbits for nvidia gpu.
Cudo miner seems to work well.
